meta.hint: Synonyms are words with the same meaning or almost the same meaning. Example - Dad and Father.
meta.question: Identify the synonym of the word in the context.

content.description:
Select the synonym of the word in bold.
Jenny comes to my home every day. Tomorrow, she will go to her aunt's house.

Select the synonym of the word in bold.
Ben is glad to see his dad. His dad is happy, too.

Select the synonym of the word in bold.
The lady smiled at Gary. She looked a friendly woman.

Select the synonym of the word in bold.
Rosy wore a beautiful dress. She was looking pretty.

Select the synonym of the word in bold.
This is a very big tree. Have you ever seen such a large tree before?
